name: The Magic World of San
description:
This game is a platformer realized with a course  of Awesome Tuts on Udemy.

Collect all the coins and defeat the boss!! 

How to play:

  • Press A and D to move left and right
  • Press Space to jump
  • Press J to shoot and kill the enemies or jump on them.

Pay attention to the enemies...  not all of them can be killed ! 

Music  created by  Migfus20 (freesound.org).
